name: Chaos With Time
description:
Can you reach the goal before time runs out?

This is my entry to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 with the theme:

Let there be chaos!

Sadly, I didn't have time to implement more features like:

- Enemies and Weapons

- More Upgrades

- Better balancing (not easy for a game like this!)

- More polish (animations, SFX, general user experience)

Credits:

- All art is from Kenney (kenney.nl)

- Music is from Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)

- All code and gameplay is from me :)
